text: The women's 4x400 metres relay event at the 1998 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Annecy, France, at Parc des Sports on 1 and 2 August. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Patricia Hall Peta-Gaye Gayle Keasha Downer Allison Beckford ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Svetlana Pospelova Olga Mikayeva Olesya Zykina Natalya Nazarova ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Mikele Barber Myra Combs Demetria Washington Nakiya Johnson ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 2 August {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
